## reinforcement learning

| **[Translating Large-Scale C Repositories to Idiomatic Rust](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.20617v1)** | 2025-11-25 | 21 pages, 14 figures |

| **[Scalable FPGA Framework for Real-Time Denoising in High-Throughput Imaging: A DRAM-Optimized Pipeline using High-Level Synthesis](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.14917v2)** | 2025-11-25 | <details><summary>FPGA-...</summary><p>FPGA-based denoising pipeline for PRISM-scale imaging. Real-time frame subtraction and averaging via burst-mode AXI4 and DRAM buffering. Benchmarked against CPU/GPU workflows; scalable across multi-bank FPGA setups. Acknowledgements revised for consistency with journal submission; scientific content remains unchanged</p></details> |
| **[Minimmit: Fast Finality with Even Faster Blocks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.10862v5)** | 2025-11-25 |  |

| **[The Ghosts of Empires: Extracting Modularity from Interleaving-Based Proofs (Extended Version)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.20369v1)** | 2025-11-25 | <details><summary>39 pa...</summary><p>39 pages, 10 figures, 1 table. Extended version with proofs of the paper published at POPL'2026 (https://doi.org/10.1145/3776684)</p></details> |
| **[Separating the Wheat from the Chaff: Understanding (In-)Completeness of Proof Mechanisms for Separation Logic with Inductive Definitions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.20193v1)** | 2025-11-25 |  |
| **[Hadamard-Pi: Equational Quantum Programming](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.06835v2)** | 2025-11-25 | <details><summary>116 p...</summary><p>116 pages; v2: Extended version of POPL 2026 publication</p></details> |
| **[Beluga: A CXL-Based Memory Architecture for Scalable and Efficient LLM KVCache Management](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.20172v1)** | 2025-11-25 | <details><summary>13 pa...</summary><p>13 pages, accepted by SIGMOD'26</p></details> |
| **[BackFed: An Efficient & Standardized Benchmark Suite for Backdoor Attacks in Federated Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.04903v2)** | 2025-11-25 | <details><summary>Our f...</summary><p>Our framework is openly available at https://github.com/thinh-dao/BackFed</p></details> |
| **[Parallel simulation and adaptive mesh refinement for 3D elastostatic contact mechanics problems between deformable bodies](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.20142v1)** | 2025-11-25 |  |
